Name: jmx_config_reload_failure_created
Description: Number of times configuration have failed to be reloaded.

Name: jmx_config_reload_failure_total
Description: Number of times configuration have failed to be reloaded.

Name: jmx_config_reload_success_created
Description: Number of times configuration have successfully been reloaded.

Name: jmx_config_reload_success_total
Description: Number of times configuration have successfully been reloaded.

Name: jmx_exporter_build_info
Description: A metric with a constant '1' value labeled with the version of the JMX exporter.

Name: jmx_scrape_cached_beans
Description: Number of beans with their matching rule cached

Name: jmx_scrape_duration_seconds
Description: Time this JMX scrape took, in seconds.

Name: jmx_scrape_error
Description: Non-zero if this scrape failed.

Name: jvm
Description: VM version info

Name: jvm_buffer_pool_capacity_bytes
Description: Bytes capacity of a given JVM buffer pool.

Name: jvm_buffer_pool_used_buffers
Description: Used buffers of a given JVM buffer pool.

Name: jvm_buffer_pool_used_bytes
Description: Used bytes of a given JVM buffer pool.

Name: jvm_classes_currently_loaded
Description: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the JVM

Name: jvm_classes_loaded_total
Description: The total number of classes that have been loaded since the JVM has started execution

Name: jvm_classes_unloaded_total
Description: The total number of classes that have been unloaded since the JVM has started execution

Name: jvm_gc_collection_seconds
Description: Time spent in a given JVM garbage collector in seconds.

Name: jvm_memory_bytes_committed
Description: Committed (bytes) of a given JVM memory area.

Name: jvm_memory_bytes_init
Description: Initial bytes of a given JVM memory area.

Name: jvm_memory_bytes_max
Description: Max (bytes) of a given JVM memory area.

Name: jvm_memory_bytes_used
Description: Used bytes of a given JVM memory area.

Name: jvm_memory_objects_pending_finalization
Description: The number of objects waiting in the finalizer queue.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_allocated_bytes_created
Description: Total bytes allocated in a given JVM memory pool. Only updated after GC, not continuously.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_allocated_bytes_total
Description: Total bytes allocated in a given JVM memory pool. Only updated after GC, not continuously.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_bytes_committed
Description: Committed bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_bytes_init
Description: Initial bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max
Description: Max bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used
Description: Used bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_collection_committed_bytes
Description: Committed after last collection bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_collection_init_bytes
Description: Initial after last collection bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_collection_max_bytes
Description: Max bytes after last collection of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_memory_pool_collection_used_bytes
Description: Used bytes after last collection of a given JVM memory pool.

Name: jvm_threads_current
Description: Current thread count of a JVM

Name: jvm_threads_daemon
Description: Daemon thread count of a JVM

Name: jvm_threads_deadlocked
Description: Cycles of JVM-threads that are in deadlock waiting to acquire object monitors or ownable synchronizers

Name: jvm_threads_deadlocked_monitor
Description: Cycles of JVM-threads that are in deadlock waiting to acquire object monitors

Name: jvm_threads_peak
Description: Peak thread count of a JVM

Name: jvm_threads_started_total
Description: Started thread count of a JVM

Name: jvm_threads_state
Description: Current count of threads by state

Name: process_cpu_seconds_total
Description: Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.

Name: process_max_fds
Description: Maximum number of open file descriptors.

Name: process_open_fds
Description: Number of open file descriptors.

Name: process_resident_memory_bytes
Description: Resident memory size in bytes.

Name: process_start_time_seconds
Description: Start time of the process since unix epoch in seconds.

Name: process_virtual_memory_bytes
Description: Virtual memory size in bytes.

Name: scrape_duration_seconds
Description: Duration of the scrape

Name: scrape_samples_post_metric_relabeling
Description: The number of samples remaining after metric relabeling was applied

Name: scrape_samples_scraped
Description: The number of samples the target exposed

Name: scrape_series_added
Description: The approximate number of new series in this scrape

Name: up
Description: The scraping was successful

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_prepared_statement_cache_access_count
Description: The number of times that the statement cache was accessed jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=PreparedStatementCacheAccessCount

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_prepared_statement_cache_add_count
Description: The number of statements added to the statement cache jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=PreparedStatementCacheAddCount

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_prepared_statement_cache_current_size
Description: The number of prepared and callable statements currently cached in the statement cache jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=PreparedStatementCacheCurrentSize

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_prepared_statement_cache_delete_count
Description: The number of statements discarded from the cache jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=PreparedStatementCacheDeleteCount

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_prepared_statement_cache_hit_count
Description: The number of times that statements from the cache were used jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=PreparedStatementCacheHitCount

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_prepared_statement_cache_miss_count
Description: The number of times that a statement request could not be satisfied with a statement from the cache jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=PreparedStatementCacheMissCount

Name: wildfly_datasource_jdbc_statistics_enabled
Description: Define whether runtime statistics are enabled or not. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=statisticsEnabled

Name: wildfly_messaging_consumer_count
Description: The number of consumers consuming messages from this queue. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=consumerCount

Name: wildfly_messaging_delivering_count
Description: The number of messages that this queue is currently delivering to its consumers. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=deliveringCount

Name: wildfly_messaging_durable
Description: Whether the queue is durable or not. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=durable

Name: wildfly_messaging_message_count
Description: The number of messages currently in this queue. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=messageCount

Name: wildfly_messaging_messages_added
Description: The number of messages added to this queue since it was created. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=messagesAdded

Name: wildfly_messaging_paused
Description: Whether the queue is paused. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=paused

Name: wildfly_messaging_scheduled_count
Description: The number of scheduled messages in this queue. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=scheduledCount

Name: wildfly_messaging_temporary
Description: Whether the queue is temporary. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=temporary

Name: wildfly_transaction_aborted_transactions
Description: The number of aborted (i.e. rolled-back) transactions. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfAbortedTransactions

Name: wildfly_transaction_application_rollbacks
Description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back by application request. This includes those that timeout, since the timeout behavior is considered an attribute of the application configuration. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfApplicationRollbacks

Name: wildfly_transaction_committed_transactions
Description: The number of committed transactions. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfCommittedTransactions

Name: wildfly_transaction_heuristics
Description: The number of transactions which have terminated with heuristic outcomes. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfHeuristics

Name: wildfly_transaction_inflight_transactions
Description: The number of transactions that have begun but not yet terminated. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfInflightTransactions

Name: wildfly_transaction_nested_transactions
Description: The total number of nested (sub) transactions created. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfNestedTransactions

Name: wildfly_transaction_resource_rollbacks
Description: The number of transactions that rolled back due to resource (participant) failure. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfResourceRollbacks

Name: wildfly_transaction_system_rollbacks
Description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back due to internal system errors. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfSystemRollbacks

Name: wildfly_transaction_timed_out_transactions
Description: The number of transactions that have rolled back due to timeout. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfTimedOutTransactions

Name: wildfly_transaction_transactions
Description: The total number of transactions (top-level and nested) created. jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=numberOfTransactions

Name: wildfly_undertow_bytes_received
Description: The number of bytes that have been received by this listener jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=bytesReceived

Name: wildfly_undertow_bytes_sent
Description: The number of bytes that have been sent out on this listener jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=bytesSent

Name: wildfly_undertow_error_count
Description: The number of 500 responses that have been sent by this listener jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=errorCount

Name: wildfly_undertow_processing_time
Description: The total processing time of all requests handed by this listener jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=processingTime

Name: wildfly_undertow_request_count
Description: The number of requests this listener has served jboss.as:name=null,type=null,attribute=requestCount
